approaches_tried: Row-based constructive with alternating angles (0° and 180°)
Parameter optimization: row_width, x_spacing, y_spacing, x_offset
findings: Row-based constructive produces WORSE results than baseline (0.64-0.73 vs 0.37)
Baseline uses MANY different angles (not just 0° and 180°)
Baseline angles are optimized per-tree for minimum bounding box
Simple constructive approaches cannot match the baseline's sophisticated packing
The baseline is at a strong local optimum achieved through extensive optimization

baseline_analysis.N=10: Uses 10 different angles, each tree has unique angle

notes: Row-based constructive approach FAILED. The baseline uses sophisticated per-tree angle optimization that simple constructive approaches cannot match. Falling back to exp_039 submission.
